hero.title: Our Privacy Policy
hero.description: Your privacy and security are our top priorities. Learn how we protect your data.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account or contact us:

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
sections.content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services:
list: Communicate with you about updates and changes

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction including SSL/TLS encryption and access controls.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. You can also request a copy of your data.

sections.title: Third-Party Services
sections.content: We may use third-party service providers who have access to your information only to perform specific tasks. They are bound by confidentiality agreements.

contact.heading: Questions About Your Privacy?
contact.description: If you have any questions about how we handle your data, our privacy team is here to help.
